template.template: Template Check IPMI Dell PowerEdge R510

resource.name: FANS RPM
resource.host: Template Check IPMI Dell PowerEdge R510

resource.name: Ambient Temp
resource.host: Template Check IPMI Dell PowerEdge R510

item.name: Cluster name
item.description: Cluster name of the guest VM.

item.name: Number of virtual CPUs
item.description: Number of virtual CPUs assigned to the guest.

item.name: CPU ready
item.description: Percentage of time that the virtual machine was ready, but could not get scheduled to run on the physical CPU. CPU ready time is dependent on the number of virtual machines on the host and their CPU loads.

item.name: CPU usage
item.description: Current upper-bound on CPU usage. The upper-bound is based on the host the virtual machine is current running on, as well as limits configured on the virtual machine itself or any parent resource pool. Valid while the virtual machine is running.

item.name: Datacenter name
item.description: Datacenter name of the guest VM.

item.name: Hypervisor name
item.description: Hypervisor name of the guest VM.

item.name: Ballooned memory
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory that is currently reclaimed through the balloon driver.

item.name: Compressed memory
item.description: The amount of memory currently in the compression cache for this VM.

item.name: Private memory
item.description: Amount of memory backed by host memory and not being shared.

item.name: Shared memory
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory shared through transparent page sharing.

item.name: Swapped memory
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory swapped out to the VM's swap device by ESX.

item.name: Guest memory usage
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory that is being used by the VM.

item.name: Host memory usage
item.description: The amount of host physical memory allocated to the VM, accounting for saving from memory sharing with other VMs.

item.name: Memory size
item.description: Total size of configured memory.

item.name: Power state
item.description: The current power state of the virtual machine.

item.name: Committed storage space
item.description: Total storage space, in bytes, committed to this virtual machine across all datastores.

item.name: Uncommitted storage space
item.description: Additional storage space, in bytes, potentially used by this virtual machine on all datastores.

item.name: Unshared storage space
item.description: Total storage space, in bytes, occupied by the virtual machine across all datastores, that is not shared with any other virtual machine.

item.name: Uptime
item.description: System uptime.

item_prototype.name: Number of bytes received on interface {#IFDESC}
Number of packets received on interface {#IFDESC}
Number of bytes transmitted on interface {#IFDESC}
Number of packets transmitted on interface {#IFDESC}

graph_prototype.name: Virt VMware Guest Network traffic on {#IFNAME}

item_prototype.name: Average number of bytes read from the disk {#DISKDESC}
Average number of reads from the disk {#DISKDESC}
Average number of bytes written to the disk {#DISKDESC}
Average number of writes to the disk {#DISKDESC}

discovery_rule.name: Mounted filesystem discovery
discovery_rule.description: Discovery of all guest file systems.

graph_prototype.name: Virt VMware Guest Disk space usage {#FSNAME}

item.name: Cluster name
item.description: Cluster name of the guest VM.

item.name: CPU usage
item.description: Aggregated CPU usage across all cores on the host in Hz. This is only available if the host is connected.

item.name: Datacenter name
item.description: Datacenter name of the hypervisor.

item.name: Full name
item.description: The complete product name, including the version information.

item.name: CPU frequency
item.description: The speed of the CPU cores. This is an average value if there are multiple speeds. The product of CPU frequency and number of cores is approximately equal to the sum of the MHz for all the individual cores on the host.

item.name: CPU model
item.description: The CPU model.

item.name: CPU cores
item.description: Number of physical CPU cores on the host. Physical CPU cores are the processors contained by a CPU package.

item.name: CPU threads
item.description: Number of physical CPU threads on the host.

item.name: Total memory
item.description: The physical memory size.

item.name: Model
item.description: The system model identification.

item.name: Bios UUID
item.description: The hardware BIOS identification.

item.name: Vendor
item.description: The hardware vendor identification.

item.name: Ballooned memory
item.description: The amount of guest physical memory that is currently reclaimed through the balloon driver. Sum of all guest VMs.

item.name: Used memory
item.description: Physical memory usage on the host.

item.name: Overall status
item.description: The overall alarm status of the host: gray - unknown, ok, red - it has a problem, yellow - it might have a problem.

item.name: Uptime
item.description: System uptime.

item.name: Version
item.description: Dot-separated version string.

item.name: Number of guest VMs
item.description: Number of guest virtual machines.

item_prototype.name: Average read latency of the datastore $3
Average write latency of the datastore $3

graph_prototype.name: Average read latency of the datastore {#DATASTORE}

trigger.name: Virt VMware Guest {HOST.NAME} has just been restarted
trigger.description: Virt VMware Guest has just been restarted

trigger.name: Virt VMware Hypervisor {HOST.NAME} has just been restarted
Virt VMware Hypervisor {HOST.NAME} Overall Status Beyond The Warning
